docs.lead_paragraph: MAN, W.Va.--If Paul and Joan Glover's third child, Christina, had been born three weeks earlier, the delivery would have cost them nothing. It would have been paid for by what was one of the most beneficent group health systems in the country, the United Mine Workers Health and Retirement Fund.

headline.main: Miners Feel Impact of Cuts in Clinic Funds; Sharp Reductions Resulted in Recent Wildcat Strike by 40,000 Coal Workers

docs.abstract: Article on financial crisis of UMW Health and Retirement Fund which caused recent wildcat strikes and threatens adequate health care in Appalachian region; illus (M)
